attributes.action: An independent commission should look into the conduct of the football association
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that for us to be fully able to address the clear failings of the international organisation FIFA, our national Football Association should also be looked at under the same scrutiny so that our footballing organisation can be looked upon as without the same alligations of corruption.

We believe that an independent commission led by the government should be set up to insititute a full investigation into the workings of the football association as to ease fans around the country that the national organisation is leading the game in a direction for future prosperity.
